description: This source file defines the HomeFragment class, which extends AndroidX's BrowseSupportFragment to display a minimal, focusable UI with a single row of cards for Android TV. It sets up UI components, creates a list of sample cards, and handles the presentation of card views.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A fragment that displays a row of cards using Android's Leanback library, suitable for Android TV interfaces.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of HomeFragment.

methods.name: onActivityCreated
methods.description: Initializes the UI and rows when the activity is created.

methods.name: setupUi
methods.description: Configures UI properties like title, brand color, headers state, and badge drawable.

methods.name: setupRows
methods.description: Creates and populates the row adapter with sample cards presented in a ListRow.
